0x-protocol-ecosystem.Description: Projects and addresses associated to 0x Protocol, an open protocol that enables the peer-to-peer exchange of assets on the Ethereum blockchain.

asset-management.Description: Asset management refers to the looking after of a single person's or an organization's assets with the goal of obtaining the best possible returnÂ for them.

enzyme-finance.Description: Enzyme is a decentralised on-chain asset management infrastructure. It provides an easy and cost-effective way to build, scale & monetise investment strategies in crypto.

investment.Description: The allocation of money or resources for the expectation of future profits and/or benefits.
